edu.calstatela.sawooope.main

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • edu.calstatela.sawooope.main.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends SurfaceView
    GameView controls what will be drawn on the screen. It has:
    • GameLoopThread which sets the frame rate (how quickly things on the screen are updated and drawn) of the game.
    • GameStateManager which controls which game screens to draw
    • drawing scale which ensures that all images are draw to scale based on the users screen density
    Author:
    Benji

                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        Paint paint)
        Draws a scaled rectangle
        Parameters:
        g - canvas being drawn on
        x - x component of the rectangle's top left corner
        y - y component of the rectangle's top left corner
        width - rectangle's width
        height - rectangle's height
        paint - paint used to color the rectnagle(can be null);
